roleset.name: make not work
roleset.note: DISABLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disable' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from disable.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: City crews tallied the wreckage to buildings, but lacked a clear sense of how gravely [transportation arteries]-1 were disabled [*-1][*T*-2].
